name: Eric Edward
description: I am a graduate of Columbia University. I have a wide variety of interests. I am comfortable in social situations, Well mannered, present well, well spoken, intelligent, cultured, interested, sophisticated, a craver of knowledge, abstract thinker, sometimes gullible, wise, serious, silly, humorous, funny, calm, hyper, excited, interested, caring, compassionate, understanding, tolerant , perceptive ,pensive, good communicator, social, passionate ,sensual, dependent, independent, peaceful, and comfortable with myself. And I am a kind person. I do some volunteer work, my favorite and what I consider the most important is visiting and supporting charity organization.
